description: Kluyveromyces marxianus is a thermotolerant yeast and can grow at elevated temperatures (> 40 °C), however, the growth of K. marxianus is strongly inhibited by accumulated inhibitors at elevated temperatures. The objective of this project is to reveal the transcriptomic responses of K. marxianus to heat and accumulated inhibitors during ethanol fermentation.
